item.title: Dodgers Stadium Tour Guides Leaflet Padres Game Amid Contract Negotiations
item.description: The workers, who unionized last year, are ramping up the pressure during contract negotiations that have stalled over wages and benefits.

item.title: Mass Shooting in Los Angeles Kills Two People and Injures Six After Music Festival
item.description: The arrest of the alleged shooter has not yet been made public after a fatal shooting.
